Color Pallete

#816159; ---> darky pink
#B99D8B; ---> light pink
#382A28; ---> browny red
#8E1616; ---> ultra reddy (used for tittles)

Fonts

font-family: 'Comfortaa', cursive; ---> comforta tittle (τιτλος)
font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; ---> open sans ( μαλλον για content)
font-family: 'Open Sans Condensed', sans-serif; ---> open sans Condensed (μαλλον για content και αυτο )

link ---> <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Comfortaa|Open+Sans|Open+Sans+Condensed:300&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
